definition: head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin

sentences.english: Another effective method is to make the arrow keys active during a drag operation.
sentences.chinese: 另一個有效的方法是在拖動操作期間激活箭頭鍵。

sentences.english: Click the right arrow key to step back through past events.
sentences.chinese: 單擊向右箭頭鍵查看歷史事件。

sentences.english: Now I'm hitting the down arrow.
Press the leave arrow to move back to the leave menu and move up to address book.
sentences.chinese: 按左箭頭鍵移回左側菜單並上移至地址本。

sentences.english: You can also use the arrow keys to navigate around the interface.
sentences.chinese: 您也可以在整個界面使用箭頭鍵。

sentences.english: Use the right and left arrow keys or left- mouse click to walk through the presentation.
sentences.chinese: 使用左右箭頭鍵或滑鼠左鍵閱覽資料。

sentences.english: Press the left and right arrow keys to ambulate.
You can navigate to any method by using your arrow keys.
sentences.chinese: 您可以使用箭頭鍵瀏覽所有方法。

sentences.english: Use your arrow keys to manoeuver the pieces.
sentences.chinese: 用你的箭頭鍵可大有作爲的作品。

sentences.english: So I'm hitting the up arrow right now.
sentences.chinese: 所以現在我在敲右箭頭鍵。

sentences.english: In ProType titler, added ability to move selected text block using arrow keys.
sentences.chinese: 在超級字工具，添加移動選擇文字塊使用箭頭鍵性能。

sentences.english: Resizes columns using the arrow and tab keys.
sentences.chinese: 用箭頭鍵和製表符鍵來調整列寬。
